description.text: The API's title, which will be used in the OpenAPI specification.
The base route for V1 of this API. Usually, it's the name of the service.

name.text: The docker image name for the API.

description.text: Docker image name which will be used during Docker build.
Flag, indicating if a git repository should be initialized.

name.text: The cloud provider which this API will use.

description.text: The cloud provider, whose services will be utilized in this API.
The CI/CD pipeline provider, used for building, testing, publishing & deploying artifacts.
The API implementation style. Minimal API or Controllers
